text: New Mexico's 3rd congressional district () is a congressional district is the U.S state of New Mexico. The district is in the north part of the state. Many Native Americans live in the district and most of the Navajo Nation is also in the district. The people who live in the district elect a person to represent the district in the United States House of Representatives. The current Representative is Democrat Teresa Leger Fernandez. ==Election history== Year Office Result 2000 President Gore 52 – 43% 2004 President Kerry 54 – 45% 2008 President Obama 61 – 38% 2012 President Obama 57 – 39% 2016 President Clinton 52 – 37% 2018 Senator Heinrich 57 – 27% 2018 Governor Lujan Grisham 61 – 39% 2020 President Biden 58 – 40% ===1982=== ===1984=== ===1986=== ===1988=== ===1990=== ===1992=== ===1994=== ===1996=== ===1997 (Special)=== ===1998=== ===2000=== ===2002=== ===2004=== ===2006=== ===2008=== ===2010=== ===2012=== ===2014=== ===2016=== ===2018=== ===2020=== ==References== 03
title: New Mexico's 3rd congressional district
